item.title: The 5 best surge protectors of 2023
item.description: The best surge protectors offer multiple USB ports and compact designs, making them the perfect complement to any electronics you buy during the holidays.

item.title: The 5 best battery life laptops 2023
item.description: Do you tire of having to be plug-adjacent because your laptop's battery life is average? Thankfully, these best battery life laptops provide the juice you need to get your work or studies done without the power cord tether.

item.title: Your bosses sent you a lovely gift? A machine told them what to buy
item.description: Can you really trust your boss to know what would make you happy?

item.title: Microsoft quietly revealed a new type of AI (it may quietly petrify you)
item.description: You always thought this might be possible, but when a famous company says it's done it, it adds a little more scariness.

item.title: Southwest Airlines just insulted unhappy customers in a truly spectacular way
item.description: There's a way to communicate apologies. Then there's this.

item.title: The 5 best Chromebook laptops of 2023
item.description: Chromebooks make the perfect gift, as they're are more affordable than flagship models, feature healthy battery lives, and possess good displays.

item.title: The 4 best cheap Windows laptops of 2023
item.description: If you're looking for a cheap Windows laptop, you don't have to skimp out on features like display, battery life, processor, or storage to find a great pick for less.

item.title: Chick-fil-A and McDonald's now have surprising competition right on their doorstep
item.description: Perhaps the upstart fast-food restaurants are learning to "think different."

item.title: This airline annoyed me deeply. It wasn't Southwest
item.description: It seemed like an innocent email. It was the start of a pitiful customer experience.

item.title: How to transfer contacts from Android to iPhone
item.description: Making the switch to iOS? Here are three easy methods to move your contacts from Android to iPhone.

item.title: The 5 best desktops for graphic design in 2023
item.description: Creative professionals need a powerful graphics processor, high-resolution display, and plenty of RAM. ZDNET rounded up the best desktops for stunning graphic design imagery.

item.title: The 7 best computers of 2023
item.description: Whether you're looking for a laptop, a Mac, a Chromebook, or a gaming PC, the best computer for you is out there. These are our top picks.

item.title: The 7 best laptops for graphic designers in 2023
item.description: Graphic designers need laptops with excellent connectivity, robust displays, and ample customization options. We found the best laptops for graphic design in 2023.

item.title: The 5 best gaming TVs of 2023
item.description: A dedicated gaming TV not only frees up your living room for other people to watch movies, it can also elevate your gaming experience with enhanced color and contrast as well as VRR support for smoother gameplay. With that in mind, ZDNET found the best gaming TVs.

item.title: The 5 best LG TVs of 2023
item.description: ZDNET researched many LG TV models in order to settle on the top five and break down their differences. The LG C2 OLED is our No. 1 choice due to its excellent picture quality, support for Dolby Vision and Atmos, and Nvidia G-Sync and AMD FreeSync Premium compatibility.

item.title: The 5 best noise cancelling earbuds of 2023
item.description: Need silence while you work, unwind, or tackle your New Year's resolutions? Noise cancelling earbuds use advanced active noise cancellation technology to block out the noise around you. We chose ones that feature Bluetooth connectivity and outstanding sound quality.

item.title: The 5 best wireless headphones of 2023
item.description: Appreciating excellent sound quality doesn't mean you are confined to cords. With the best wireless headphones, you can work, move, and game effortlessly. Topping our list is the Sony WH-1000XM5s, offering you exceptional sound with Dolby Atmos and Spatial audio.

item.title: Best 2-in-1 laptop 2023: Top hybrid notebooks
item.description: Hybrid laptops/tablets, or 2-in-1s, offer maximum flexibility in a portable computing device. So, what is the best 2-in-1 laptop to buy? Our top pick is the Dell XPS 13 2-in-1 for its 4K screen options and support for Thunderbolt 4 connectivity.

item.title: The 5 best 4K TVs of 2023
item.description: You don't need to spend a fortune for a quality TV. We rounded up the best 4K TVs with video and music streaming, hands-free voice control, and Bluetooth connectivity.

item.title: The 5 best touchscreen laptops of 2023
item.description: Want to get more hands-on with your work? The best touchscreen laptops offer crystal clear displays and long battery lives, making them perfect devices for going back to school or winter streaming binges.
